Ruqoyah:
My Dearest Ruqoyah, 
From the moment you entered my life, everything changed in the most beautiful way possible. You brought light where there was darkness, warmth where there was cold, and love that has filled every corner of my heart. With each passing day, I have come to realize just how incredibly blessed I am to have you by my side. 
The years we have spent together have been nothing short of extraordinary. Every laughter, every tear, every memory we have created is a testament to the profound connection we share. 
Through it all, you have shown me what true love looks like: kind, patient, understanding, yet fierce and unwavering. Your strength inspires me; your compassion humbles me, and your beauty inside and out takes my breath away. 
Ruqoyah, my love for you grows deeper with every sunrise, and I cannot imagine a single day without you in my life. You are my partner, my confidante, my greatest supporter, and the person who makes my world whole. It is because of you that I wake up each morning with hope and gratitude, knowing that I get to spend another day loving you. 
Today, I want to take this love we have built and make it eternal. I want to profess the love I have for you in public with our parents, friends, and family in attendance to bear witness to our matrimony. 
Will you do me the immense honor of becoming my wife?  
I promise to cherish, protect, and stand by your side through every joy and challenge that comes our way. Together, let us create a lifetime of memories, laughter, and endless love, FIH DUNYA WAL AKHIRA. 
With all my heart, 

Abdulazeez
